issue.title: C++: Convenience construct Table from schema and arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-907](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-907). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Instead of letting the user wrap all his array instances into a column each, we could provide a Table constructor that uses the fields from the schema.
